p.s: The blog post Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects written by Ankita Mitra and published in the Blog on Environment on the February 5th in 2014 deals with environmental pollution, its causes and effects.
According to Mitra, environmental pollution is the harming of our environment by pollutants, such as from industry, weapons, cars, synthetic products et cetera.
It is caused by the quickly growing urbanization and industrialization as product of modern technology and science.
The effects are hazardous on our biosphere, animals and people, who are responsible for the pollution.
All food is contaminated today, and scientists call the current time an era of mass extinction.
Mitra finishes her post by stating if we failed to restore balance today, it would be too late tomorrow.
